Question: This person has served as the national spokesperson for Boys & Girls Clubs of America since 1993.
Hints: This person attended grammar school at Pennington-Grimes Elementary School in Mount Vernon until 1968.
This person directed and starred in the drama The Great Debaters with Forest Whitaker.
In 2008, this person visited Israel with a delegation of African American artists in honor of the Jewish state's 60th birthday.
